name: Strongholds We Build
description:
Build a castle with two piece types. A square tower and wall segments. All you have to do is select one of the pieces in the lower middle of the screen and click away. Your only goal . . . BUILD AWESOME STRONGHOLDS!

You will be able to destroy pieces with the pickax! Though removing pieces is slower going.

Remember you only have 20 months (seconds in our world) to build you mighty stronghold. Good luck!
